definition: cigarette lighter (in a car)/12-volt cigarette lighter receptacle

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: A three Cigarette Lighter, very thoughtful, on-board electrical appliances you use needs.
sentences.chinese: 一分三点烟器，非常体贴你对车载电器使用的需求。

sentences.english: The invention in question was the first cordless automobile cigarette lighter.
sentences.chinese: 被起诉的发明是第一汽车点烟器。

sentences.english: This means you can also operate it from your vehicle's cigarette lighter adapter.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着你也能够在你的汽车的点烟器适配器它。

sentences.english: Fits all standard Car Cigarette Lighter Jacks , Provides up to 120Watts of AC Power.
sentences.chinese: 适用于所有类型汽车点烟器，功率最高可达120W。

sentences.english: And since I don't smoke I don't need the cigarette lighter in there anyway.
sentences.chinese: 而且由于我不抽烟，我不需要香烟点烟器放在那里面。

sentences.english: Improve the production equipment Nissan Cigarette Lighter socket 100000.
sentences.chinese: 完善的生产设备，日产点烟器插座10万。

sentences.english: A cigar-lighter is an accessory to a car.
sentences.chinese: 点烟器是汽车的一种附件。

sentences.english: The battery power is low, do not use cigarette lighter.
sentences.chinese: 手机提示电池电量低时，不要使用点烟器。

definition: glove compartment (of a car)/glovebox (sealed compartment with attached gloves for handling hazardous materials etc)
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
electric light socket/burner (component of a kerosene lamp)/light (as a countable item, e.g. number of lights fitted in a house)
